name: Professional Procrastination
description:
Created for the low effort jam - https://itch.io/jam/low-effort-jam-2

You stumble upon a badly optimized String and set out to minimize it as much as you can. Your ToDo-List thinks this is a waste of time.

This prototype tries to capture the satisfaction of reducing things in size - did it achieve anything close-ish? Please tell me! :)

Includes:

  • Defining and replacing patterns
  • Defining repetitions
  • Very annoying ToDo List

Does *NOT* include:

  • Sound or music
  • Pretty images
  • Support for functions with parameters  =(
    • (might be added at some point in the future because everything is better with parameters!)

... as these would have been a lot of effort.

Have fun with the low effort jam everyone :)
